column1: Little Goat Diner////The coffee bar and bread shop are perfect for stopping in to pick up a cup of Stumptown coffee (hands down the best brew in the neighborhood now) or loaf of bread to go
column2: and they also have an assortment of goodies to poke through
column3: from locally made honey and soap to fresh flowers. If you're waiting for a table and you can edge in a spot at the bar
